name: Jimdo
text:
Jimdo offers people the possibility of creating a website with no coding knowledge whatsoever.

Jimdo's strengths include ease of use, flexible designs, and the simple interface that makes it possible for anyone to add photos, videos, and text to their websites.

We're an extremely motivated team with a lot of smart people who work hard and have fun together. Everyone is an expert in his or her own field, and our goal is to create the best possible service for everyone who uses Jimdo. Our small company would offer you the freedom to explore and refine your own great ideas.
